Qeynos Twisted


Both filled with horror and intrigue, I decided I wanted to visit other areas of Norrath before I woke up from this change of perspective. I went to the other side of the world first. Qeynos....




I awoke at the bank in Qeynos and took a city-wide tour.
This is the pool near the bank.




I ran out to the docks to admire the fluid movement of the ocean but was stopped by the new decor of the Mermaid's Lure...




This Woman was standing on the dock. I was amused by the eyes all over her body.




After fleeing in terror from the Docks, I re-entered Qeynos via the square.
Though these pictures are neat,they do not completely encompass
how alien this environment that had been so familiar had become. This image stopped me for a few minutes...




I decided to gate out to the main Qeynos entrance.
When I arrived I was facing the plains heading out towards the hills.
The Plains were such a site that I was dumbstruck again by the chaos when I finally DID
turn around and face the gates to Qeynos itself!




I decided to seek some peace by escaping below into the Catacombs beneath the city. I knew immediately upon slipping behind the ivy-covered passageway that Peace was not what I would find below...




I attempted to relax by taking a nice swim, but the scintillating colors in the water made my mind Swirl!!!





Finally, to prevent my own drowning, I retreated from the waters in search of some shadow in which to rest inside the city itself!




At this point I was getting a little sensorily overload.
I ran to Sneed's for some water but was greeted by this new effacement of his shop!




In my panicked running I ran thru the zone towards the Bank again.
I stopped at the clock to catch the time but...



Back at the bank I became aware that Night had fallen.
The moon was full enough to cloud anyone's mind!



I opted to move on...Perhaps the twisting of my reality had marked me for I felt an evil in my center and when I went to sleep that night I dreamt I was a Dark Elf!.....





Greater Faydark
Qeynos
Neriak, Lavastorm and Grobb
